评论详情: I purchased this dress to sing in a Victorian dinner theater at our church.  It came wrinkled but the wrinkles released when I wet it down in the shower a couple of times and let it dry.  I purchased a steamer to use for next year.  It did take quite a bit of time to receive this item so order early if you need it.  The material is very nice and high quality.

I am impressed with the quality of this dress! It’s simplicity makes it look elegant and the pearl detail is a pretty touch. I ordered it to wear for Halloween but I would definitely wear it to a formal event, as well.
